topics.body:
Just watched an old Digimon OVA Movie which portrayed Taichi and Hikari when they were little kids and their first encounter with Digimon.
Aaa, the feeling of nostalgia...

Nothing beats the first series of Digimon. Digimon Tamers and Digimon Data Squad came close but nothing and I mean nothing, can beat the original series of Digimon.

topics.body:
Lucky Star ep15 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]That was a different first 7 seconds

god i hate being short

Konata is either depressed or feeling friendship

cherry blossoms :3

medical masks are fairly common in Japan aren't they?

top-notch April Fools joke, Konata

and what goes around comes around XD

re-marriage? interesting

WELCOME TO THE NIGHTLIFE, KONATA AND TSUKASA WILL BE YOUR GUIDES

dangit, not separation D:

"what are we, the background scenery or something?" they know too much

Konata's spring romance fantasies...? wut

"you've been here two years and you still don't know where the nurse's office is?" wow Konata really is me

no don't add feels D:

thank you buzz-kill Konata :P

oh i remember when i went to bed at 10 or 11 PM... (looks at clock, currently 10:49 PM)

KONATA LIVING THE NIGHTLIFE WITH only a few regrets

Minoru getting let go... ouch XD

wait is it even still April Fools' Day

and Akira ends on a happy note... we'll see how long it lasts[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

seriously what is with these live action EDs

and who are these people talking about the next episode
